remarks: The evaluation of a scalar of a subring yields the same result as evaluated as a scalar over the ring itself.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1scasrng.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1scasrng.o $e |- O = ( eval1 ` S ) $.
evls1scasrng.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` U ) $.
evls1scasrng.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evls1scasrng.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` S ) $.
evls1scasrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1scasrng.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
evls1scasrng.c $e |- C = ( algSc ` P ) $.
evls1scasrng.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1scasrng.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1scasrng.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. R ) $.
evls1scasrng $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( A ` X ) ) = ( O ` ( C ` X ) ) ) $.
